participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Caring and nurturing with a love for storytelling.
participant_1.background: i am a baby delivery nurse. i love disneyland and mickey mouse. i walk three miles every day. i love to spend time with my family. my favorite way to relax is to read a book.

participant_2.name: Max
participant_2.personality: Playful and imaginative with a big heart.
participant_2.background: i like to look at blocks and sing about letters. i am four years old. i like to talk but people have a hard time understanding. i like to eat chocolate candy. when i grow up i want to be a dog.
